pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4189:Source fields dropdown for Mapping and filtering
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Source fields dropdown for Mapping and filtering
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: Theses props can be replaced with just {...data.mapProps} sourceData={[]} mappingVisible={true}

nodes.bodyText: Try adding data-testid={row.name.split('/').pop()+'-mapexpression'} so we can get map expression for an entity property instead of using getAll*
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -489,15 +513,20 @@ const SourceToEntityMap = (props) => {
             render: (text, row) => (<div className={styles.mapExpParentContainer}><div className={styles.mapExpressionContainer}>
                 <TextArea
                     id="mapexpression"
+                    data-testid="mapexpression"

nodes.bodyText:
Same as above. Try adding data-testid={row.name.split('/').pop()+'-listIcon'}. Selectors should always be unique.
Should the handleSourceList take row.name as input just like function list handler?
Do we need a testid for successMessage. Will the test work if we expect(getByText('All changes are saved')). Lets try to use data-testid as last resort if nothing works.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -544,12 +573,11 @@ const SourceToEntityMap = (props) => { let mesg = `All changes are saved on ${convertDateFromISO(new Date())}` let errorMesg = `An error occured while saving the changes.` - let msg = - let errorMsg = + let msg =

nodes.bodyText: Did the proposed change not work for you?
can we move afterEach inside describe. We already have one in there.
fx search also has the same className. Can we ensure we are getting the correct inputBox here
Since we are able to verify indentation using RTL, can we add a test using XML data to verify indentation, namespaces and attributes.
